article_title: Is treating ballast water enough to protect the Great Lakes?
article_text: The Great Ships Initiative, established in 2006, is a regional effort devoted to ending the problem of invasive species in the Great Lakes-St. Lawrence Seaway System brought about by ocean-going ships. At its facility in Superior, it does testing to help develop ballast water treatment systems.

At its facility in Superior, it does testing to help develop ballast water treatment systems.
The Great Ships Initiative, established in 2006, is a regional effort devoted to ending the problem of invasive species in the Great Lakes-St. Lawrence Seaway System brought about by ocean-going ships.
